member.name: XAUDIO2_DEBUG_CONFIGURATION
member.summary: Contains the new global debug configuration for XAudio2. Used with the function.

summary.para: Bitmask of enabled debug message types. Can be 0 or one or more of the following:

listheader.description:
Log warning messages.
Note Enabling XAUDIO2_LOG_WARNINGS also enables XAUDIO2_LOG_ERRORS.

Log detailed informational messages.
Note Enabling XAUDIO2_LOG_DETAIL also enables XAUDIO2_LOG_INFO.
Log public API function entries and exits.

Log internal function entries and exits.
Note Enabling XAUDIO2_LOG_FUNC_CALLS also enables XAUDIO2_LOG_API_CALLS.
Log delays detected and other timing data.
Log usage of critical sections and mutexes.

summary.para: Message types that will cause an immediate break. Can be 0 or one of the following:

listheader.description:
Break on warning messages.
Note Enabling XAUDIO2_LOG_WARNINGS also enables XAUDIO2_LOG_ERRORS.

member.name: XAUDIO2_DEBUG_CONFIGURATION.LogThreadID
member.summary: Indicates whether to log the thread ID with each message.

member.name: XAUDIO2_DEBUG_CONFIGURATION.LogFileline
member.summary: Indicates whether to log source files and line numbers.

member.name: XAUDIO2_DEBUG_CONFIGURATION.LogFunctionName
member.summary: Indicates whether to log function names.

member.name: XAUDIO2_DEBUG_CONFIGURATION.LogTiming
member.summary: Indicates whether to log message timestamps.
